item.title: locally importing passwords to firefox
item.description: tl;dr Use chrome instead to import csv files and, then use Firefox’s in-built import from other browser I recently had the need to import passwords to Firefox locally using a CSV file. I had a CSV file containing logins exported from KeepassXC and was looking for a way to add them to Firefox. The Mozilla Support page says the feature is disabled by default and has no instruction on how to enable it.
